collectionMetadata.name: Proportion of Establishments That Provided Non-Statutory Leave by Type
collectionMetadata.description:
Source: Conditions of Employment Survey, Manpower Research & Statistics Department, MOM

Data pertain to private sector establishments each with at least 25 employees and the public sector.
Data pertain to permanent employees and employees on term contract of at least one year.
Family Care Leave was collected from 2018 onwards. Prior to that, it was termed ‘Parental Care/Sick Leave’, which is not reported here. *Family Care Leave is inclusive of Parental Care/Sick Leave in 2018, 2020 and 2022.
Data is available biennially.
